name: RUKUS
overview:
Data meets video: RUKUS automates the creation of unique video content for publishers and deeply personalized advertising for marketers.

For MARKETERS:RUKUS combines customer data such as names, income, and habits with video rendering, delivering deeply personalized content per-customer. For PUBLISHERS:RUKUS automates slow and laborious task of generating thousands of unique graphics for broadcast, increasing production value, empowering the storytelling team and reducing cost.

For MARKETERS Video lacks the agility of static advertising. Generating variations on a message or content is impossible at scale. RUKUS automates content creation based on any large dataset, i.e. names, income, habits, or geography. For PUBLISHERS generating thousands of unique graphics for daily publication requires significant manpower and quality control considerations. With RUKUS, publishers realize greater production value and cost savings.

Initially, we are targeting data-rich loyalty rewards programs and TV entertainment and news publishers.
